bookingLocationId.title: bookingLocationId
bookingLocationId.description: The booking location Id the user wants to get location information from. Use this to get the Name, Address, Timezone, location information or if the location is virtual.

country.title: country
country.description: Optional: The sanitised country Alpha 3 code the user provides to search for bookable locations.

productId.title: productId
productId.description: Optional: productId input if the user wants to search for locations with this product in stock.

state.title: state
state.description: Optional: The sanitised state code the user provides to search for bookable locations.
